queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{php}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-mysql}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-php}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{httpd}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{httpd}}.volumeMounts.name={{httpd-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{httpd}}.volumeMounts.name={{sockets}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{php}}.volumeMounts.name={{configmap-php}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{php}}.volumeMounts.name={{sockets}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{httpd}}.volumeMounts.name={{httpd-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{php}}.volumeMounts.name={{httpd-data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-mysql}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{php}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-php}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{httpd}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet
Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-php}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-php}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-mysql}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-chown-mysql}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init-chown-php}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init-chown-php}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init-chown-mysql}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init-chown-mysql}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{php}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{php}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{httpd}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{httpd}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.apiVersion of Deployment  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=init-chown-mysql does not have a security context
spec.template.spec.containers.name=php does not have a security context
spec.template.spec.containers.name=httpd does not have a security context
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=init-chown-php does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.
Service should Target a Pod

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.selector label refers to a Pod label
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-lamp}}.spec.selector label does not match with any Pod label
